name: 3D Massage
description:
A variety of scenarios - we provide players with a variety of rooms for players to choose freely

Free dress up - we provide players with a variety of clothes and props for players to dress up their "she" freely

Simple and easy to use - the game operation is very simple, you only need to understand the key position of moving forward, backward, left and right, and follow the prompts at the right time.

All props are open - all costume props are open to players, and you can experience the complete game content at any time.



Instructions:
W, A, S, D keys: control the movement of characters

C key: control the character to squat

Left mouse button: end basin
